sentence.Network_en: However, traders tended to discount the rumor.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而，商人往往不相信这一谣传。

sentence.Network_en: Rumor has it that he is having an affair with his secretary.
sentence.Network_cn: 谣传他和他的秘书有暧昧关系.

sentence.Network_en: Rumor has it that her husband has gone over the hill.
sentence.Network_cn: 谣传她丈夫偷偷离开了.

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌名：Rumor 演唱歌手：东方神起 专辑名称：Why？(Keep Your Head Down) 发行公司：SM Entertainment 发行日期：2011年01月05日 语言种类：韩语 唱片类型：Dance锛埡級 歌曲信息 《Rumor》有力量的旋律和和音让人印象深刻。中板的旋律也令这首歌相当振奋人心，中毒式的高潮部分，相当朗朗上口，让人很容易就能记住。歌曲主要表现出对于纯洁爱情的期望，也是一首相当是时尚歌曲。 歌词 Rumor 我只为你而活的选择，不

means.word_mean: 1. gossip (usually a mixture of truth and untruth) passed around by word of mouth

sentences.sentence: "It was rumored that the next president would be a woman"

means.word_mean: <美>传闻, 风闻;谣言, 谣传

sentences.en: There are all sorts of rumors in the air that dozens of people were dead in the fire.
sentences.cn: 有各种传闻说许多人在那场大火中死亡。

sentences.en: There has been a rumor mill on him for years.
sentences.cn: 几年来, 一直有谣言产生，对他进行中伤。
